docs.text: Master Requirement @Nex Master - Average 1:25 min/kill across 2 b2b solo kills (no dummy). b2b2b required if using Ascendri bolts. Current Masters : 14 Smoke Phase ⬥ Switch bolts when you proc Ruby or when it's close to death. Shadow Phase ⬥ Get a walked Fragmentation shot pre-phase. Blood Phase ⬥ Don't lose any ticks pre-phasing nor during the phase. A maximum of 1 tick lost is expected of a Nex master. Ice Phase ⬥ Get a walked Fragmentation shot pre-phase. Zaros Phase ⬥ Don't walk your Armadyl book procs. Example Mastery Submission Smoke Cloud: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aDh7CekqgbA by #Hoobs
docs.title: Nex

docs.text: Master Requirement @Temple of Aminishi Master - Sub 11:00 solo full run. Current Masters : 4 Pathing and General Notes ⬥ Section 1 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Make sure to Chin all mobs at once with the appropiate luring at the first, third and fifth gate. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Chincend meleers. ⬥ Section 2 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Lure the appropiate mobs to only have to deal with 2-3 separate groups with the proper walk at the fourth gate. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Proper Surge + Bladed Dive around the lake area with a Powerburst of Acceleration ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Make sure to not chain aggro Zealots before the stairs to the Masuta section to Chin ‎ ‎all of them at once. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Make sure to not chain aggro Zealots at top of stairs and group them up with Rout / Demoralize to Chin ‎ ‎them all at once. ⬥ Section 3 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Lure the 2 Sadakagamis at the start to Chin ‎ ‎them all at once. ⬥ All lures should be done at a fast pace. ⬥ Switch to Ring of Death when mobs die for adrenanline. Sanctum Guardian ⬥ No banking at the Sanctum Guardian. ⬥ Good damage. ⬥ Good ability priorization. Masuta the Ascended ⬥ No teleporting out at Masuta. ⬥ Proper Incendiary Shot / Natural Instinct timing. ⬥ Good ability priorization. Seiryu, the Azure Serpent ⬥ Use Powerburst of Acceleration to get into Seiryu's arena and Death's Swiftness over the Flank line. ⬥ Phase Seiryu right after his 2nd Dragonbreath or faster. ⬥ 1 cycle crystals. ⬥ Good ability priorization. Example Mastery Submission Melee: https://youtu.be/i7F-uZuNFnQ by #Onyksi Ranged: https://youtu.be/hoX9YddzNN0 by #senie
docs.title: ED1: Temple of Aminishi

docs.text: Master Requirement @Dragonkin Laboratory Master - Sub 14:00 solo full run Current Masters : 5 Pathing and General Notes ⬥ Good Chin Seren Godbow use at: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• The 1st room. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• The 1st Celestial Dragon + Blobs. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• The 3 Black Dragons before Verak Lith. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• The 4 Gemstone Dragons, including luring for setup ⬥ Chin Lava Strykeworms. ⬥ Dominion Mine usage. ⬥ Powerburst of Acceleration after the 2x Lava Strykeworms. Astellarn ⬥ Good pre-phase HP. ⬥ Proper positioning. ⬥ Proper Death’s Swiftness placement & timing. Verak Lith ⬥ Attempt to pre-Mine Spires ⬥ Lure to bridge. ⬥ Good ability priorization. Black Stone Dragon ⬥ 2x Dominion Mines for hands. ⬥ Incendiary Shot + Natural Instinct during Flight phase Example Mastery submissions Melee: https://youtu.be/qAGd1KLGjeA (outdated) by #Finah Mage: https://youtu.be/rQDaUsbrbQM (outdated) by #Onyksi Ranged: https://youtu.be/AjuBCnsnDLY by #Evil Lucario

Taraket ⬥ Fast entry. ⬥ Lure Taraket properly to Carrier (Ranged) ⬥ Bloat skip. (plus Carrier skip with Melee) ⬥ Portal skip (Ranged). ⬥ Proper amulet juggle. ⬥ Flanking 4 Ambassador ⬥ Fast entry. ⬥ 1 cycle Ambassador with time to spare. ⬥ Incendiary Shot / Meteor Strike + Natural Instinct pre-build. ⬥ Flanking 4 Example Master Submissions Melee: https://youtu.be/sVGhTNvWvbM by #Evil Lucario Ranged: https://youtu.be/6KyxipA08cM by #Paludan

docs.title: Raksha

docs.text: Master Requirement @RotS Master - 46 kill hour (Incite, subject to vod review) Current Masters : 10 Tunneling ⬥ Knowing how to maneuver around tunnels and make efficient use of Powerburst of Acceleration potions. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Awareness of Surge spots and important rock locations. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎- Not dropping rocks. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Drink an Acceleration pot every 2nd tunnel in sync with the team. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Be aware of who will be making each subsequent instance Follow the Proper Rotation ⬥ Proper rotations followed, which depends on what rotation it is that day ⬥ Proper use of positioning with regards to starting and running. ⬥ Manage your adrenaline, with appropriate use of Adrenaline renewal and Combat dummies ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• This includes reacting to occasional fast kills where you wont have time to build adrenaline back up. Specials Should optimally never really see specials, at most you will probably see 2 Karil specs ⬥ Minimum number of specs will be seen when you properly learn to two-step and follow the rotation ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Assuming you see a spec it really depends how it is dealt with as well ⬥ Assuming you see a Karil spin side shouldnt be more than 21s ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Eldritch crossbow → Snipe → Greater Ricochet ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Time Snipe to hit as soon as Karil becomes susceptible after spinning. ⬥ If you see an Ahrim spin that is a very bad sign. ⬥ Assuming bomb should still be sub 20, depending on how the kill is going. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Hopping sides is an important factor to keep in mind, specially if its near the end of the kill and you are East. ⬥ Reacting to Karil spec on the opposite side, watching out for lightning, not getting hit by bombs and attack Karil on ledge. Example Master Submission West: https://youtu.be/Kj_QAoQ21Qk by #Samuel x East: https://youtu.be/JMh0JlECnkc by #xleeq
docs.title: Rise of the Six

docs.text: Master Requirement @Vorago Master - Sub 9:10 average over 2 b2b Duo kills on any week (must show exp drops) Current Masters : 12 Phase 1 ⬥ Solo Lure (base) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• A strong rotation is expected. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Using a Natural Instinct rotation (dummy at face) is recommended but not required. ⬥ Hammer Climb (bomb) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Climb should be done cleanly. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎- Base should not take the red bomb. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Acceleration pot climb is not required. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎- Accel pot climb can save around 1-4 ticks with a higher execution difficult for both you and your base (rotation). ⬥ Post-jump rotations should be adjusted in relation to hp remaining. Phase 2 ⬥ Storm Shards ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• 10 is expected, at a minimum 7. ⬥ Vorago should be consistently debuffed. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Statius's warhammer + Quake ⬥ Rotating Barricade + Intercept properly ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Base should step out of melee distance if random red bomb. ⬥ Vorago should be damaged on the tick he stands after Bring Him Down. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Shatter should be on tick. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• The boss should be vulned for this part. ⬥ Combat dummy should be placed correctly at the end of phase according to the weekly rotation. Phase 3 ⬥ A Natural Instinct rotation is required. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• should be timed correctly. ⬥ Pre-Barge dummy + stall Statius's warhammer (base) ⬥ Pre-Eldritch crossbow (range) + stall an ability (bomb) ⬥ Should not lose ticks throughout phase. Phase 4 ⬥ Shard off cooldown. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Number is variable depending on week. ⬥ Vorago should be consistently debuffed. ⬥ Statius's warhammer + Quake ⬥ Stone Clone Skip should be executed correctly. ⬥ Rotation after last Waterfall. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Shatter ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• The boss should be under Vulnerability for this part. ⬥ Combat Dummy should be placed correctly at the end of phase. ⬥ Natural Instinct for p5 should be timed perfectly. Phase 5 ⬥ Damage boosting ultimate should be timed correctly. ⬥ A 0 special rotation should be attempted. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Full 0 special push is not required. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Should push atleast 4 tiles before Vorago's 1st attack. Example Master Submissions Range bomb tank: https://youtu.be/skBT02-KGE0 by #Die Alive
docs.title: Vorago

docs.text: Grandmaster Requirement @Solak Grandmaster - Sub 5:40 Duo (-10s if storm tanking) Current Grandmasters : 4 Phase 1 ⬥ DPS does 2 Eldritch Crossbow before skip. ⬥ Zaros Godsword with Magic / Melee is used after your Berserk . ⬥ Make use of a Combat dummy & Mechanized chinchompas for faster legs. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Auto-fail if this is not done. ⬥ An appropiate Core rotation is followed. Phase 2 ⬥ Efficient South & North Eruptions. ⬥ Calorie Bomb guidelines: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• → → - No Calorie Bomb. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• → → - Calorie Bomb is used. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎- The / may not be needed if your ability priorization was good enough. ⬥ It's beneficial to do Natural Instinct → Divert for Range / Melee hybrid, as much as Ranged camp to allow a Natural Instinct → Incendiary Shot → Divert for rapid Phase 3's. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• This has the advantage of allowing Adrenaline Renewal on your Death's Swiftness in P3 for Melee / Range hybrid. Phase 3 ⬥ Natural Instinct → Divert allows bled Assault → 5t Flurry → Destroy and can still finish Berserk on 100% for instant Death's Swiftness ⬥ Using Vengeance on the pad bomb hit will damage Erethdor directly. ⬥ As a DPS, Death's Swiftness is placed North. ⬥ Base lures South to allow Flanking ⬥ Dealing with the stun mechanic before it actually happens. ⬥ Instant pad p3. ⬥ A near instant mind entry. ⬥ A good ability priorization on Erethdor. P4 ⬥ Barge on tick. ⬥ Adjust based off damage dealt to either do: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• 3t Flurry → Destroy / Shatter → Destroy / Shatter ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Stall Hurricane → Flurry ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• If over 350k+ you may need to stall Assault + Cleave ⬥ Storm Shards should have been used enough throughout the previous phases to be detonated for good damage in this phase. ⬥ Using Vengeance on the bomb hit. ⬥ Making use of Dharok's relic by being low HP. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Wrath as a last ditch attempt for non-ECB . Example Mastery Submission DPS Range brid: https://youtu.be/PtAJ2mW_AQU by #doink DPS Range: https://youtu.be/CuGGbmJspf8 by #gurran Base Range Brid: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9rI-_X20y6Y by #LiesAndTears
docs.title: Solak

docs.text: Grandmaster Requirement @Telos Grandmaster - Sub 3:50 (Magic) or Sub 4:00 (Melee) or Sub 3:15 (Range) average over 3 b2b kills at 2449%+ Current Grandmasters : 5 Magic ⬥ Phase 1 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Lure correctly so that you clear tendrils and can surge to jump spot without wasting time ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Adjusting rotation to damage/hp threshold (e.g. make use of divert/res before charging deto so that you can save your ds for P2) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Knowing when to Vengeance ⬥ Phase 2 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Vengeance and Disruption shield appropriately. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Lure Telos correctly so that it’s not in the beam and your Ripper demon can attack without getting stuck. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Ripper demon juicing via drinking Spiritual prayers ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Adjusting rotation to damage / HP threshold ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎- Replacing 2nd Asphyxiate with Dragon breath is an example of this. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Stall ability after meeting HP threshold if the opportunity occurs ⬥ Phase 3 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Get into the beam fast ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Adjusting rotation to damage / HP threshold ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎- Auto + Detonate Guthix staff VS auto + Detonate Asphyxiate ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Stall ability after meeting HP threshold if the opportunity occurs. ⬥ Phase 4 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Get into the fonts as fast as possible. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Avoid over-stunning Telos after meeting HP threshold. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Avoid being overly defensive walking into 2nd font. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎- Overstunning, then using Devotion and walking to the font is an example of this. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Fix golem positioning if needed without losing hits on the font. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Heading to font 3 directly is assumed. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Vengeance / Disruption shield before phasing into Phase 5. ⬥ Phase 5 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Ring of vigor for your Ultimates and Special Attacks. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Incite Fear is used. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Employing knowledge of autos when using defensives ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎- Auto after Barricade to allow for Guthix staff → Asphyxiate without ‎ ‎Limitless is an example of this. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Vengeance ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Ripper demon juicing via drinking Spiritual prayers ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Take advantage of your HP, especially under Powerburst of vitality ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎- Camping Deflect Melee for ‎ ‎Reflect is key. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Make use of beam positions and react correctly to virus ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎- If it's currently side beam green and beam positions change so that red is North, then move to red beam, Entangle minions, and stay in the red beam while avoiding rocks is an example of these reactions. Melee ⬥ Phase 1 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Make sure your Ripper is spammed. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Stall Assault properly. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• No SoL is used unless you bring the Wand with you to the instance. ⬥ Phase 2 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Use ZGS well, if you get a very fast P1 you properly Escape and Bladed Dive back in. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Stunlocking over ZGS is an instant-fail. Albeit good for safety, its bad for speed. ⬥ Phase 3 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Properly balance the beam so start of P4 isn't bad. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Beam lures should be known. ⬥ Phase 4 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Take more risks by not fully stunlocking ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Fast font 3 ⬥ Phase 5 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Camp Deflect Melee with Reflect + Vitality ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Berserk early before Barricade . Ranged ⬥ Phase 1 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Not stalling Snap Shot is insta fail. ⬥ Phase 2 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Always phase before Hold Still and try not to stun much if you can help it ⬥ Phase 3 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Good ability priorization. ⬥ Phase 4 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• ChinSGB on font 1 and 3. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Zero autos after font 2, stuns allowed. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Stuns are allowed. ⬥ Phase 5 ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Proper back beam Surge. Example Master Submission Magic: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1078202355 by #G0att Melee: https://youtu.be/0PXNdnRqEwI?t=682 by #Evil Lucario Range: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1078201313 by #G0att Note: The melee example is heavily sped up (watch at .25x).
docs.title: Telos

docs.text: Mastery system reqs Introduction Welcome to our Mastery System channel, the purpose of these objectives is to give you an incentive on improving your strategies and to clarify the level of proficiency it is expected at certain points of one's PvM career. Note: For all times listed with "sub", on-the-dot kill times are acceptable e.g. "sub 10" accepts submissions at a kill time of exactly 10:00. Tier 1 All submissions require supporting video of kill to be reviewed by staff. If unable to provide your own, then someone else's recording will suffice. A full screenshot that includes the in game kill timer + group interface (where relevant), or the Boss tab will also work depending on the circumstance. Initiate Initiate represents a basic understanding of the encounter and of the meta farming strategies. ⬥ @AoD Initiate - Sub 2:45 7man OR 7man tag in 7-10man AoD Discord ⬥ @Araxxor Initiate ‎ ‎- Two b2b kills of average time on one path: top: 2:45 (no skip), mid 3:15, bottom 3:10 ⬥ @Nex Initiate - Average 2:30 min/kill across 2 b2b kills, solo ⬥ @Temple of Aminishi Initiate - Solo: 1:30 Sanctum Guardian + Sub 3:15 Masuta + Sub 4:20 Seiryu ⬥ @Dragonkin Laboratory Initiate - Solo: Sub 1:00 Astellarn + Sub 2:20 Verak Lith + Sub 4:00 Black Stone Dragon ⬥ @Shadow Reef Initiate - Solo: Sub 1:20 Crassian Leviathan + Sub 2:30 Taraket + Sub 4:20 Ambassador ⬥ @Raksha Initiate - Average 3:30 min/kill across 2 b2b kills, solo or duo ⬥ @RotS Initiate - 9 kills in 15 minutes (36 kph pace) ⬥ @Solak Initiate - Sub 9:00 Duo ⬥ @Telos Initiate - Sub 5:30 300%+ (no BoB) ⬥ @Vorago Initiate - Sub 13 Duo Vorago (no BoB) Feats ⬥ @Duo BM - Duo Beastmaster Durzag ⬥ @Duo Mirage - Duo Yakamaru (Mirage phase) ⬥ @Duo AoD - Duo AoD ⬥ @Record Holder 🥇 - Hold a PvM World Record Tier 2 All submissions require supporting video of kill to be reviewed by staff. If unable to provide your own, then someone else's recording will suffice depending on the circumstance. Adept Adept represents knowledge of advanced strategies and progress towards mastering the encounter. ⬥ @AoD Adept - Sub 2:20 average across 3 b2b 7man kills (Melee must be N/NW, mage/range subject to vod review) OR Member of Nex AoD FC ⬥ @Araxxor Adept - Two b2b kills of average time on all paths: Top: 2:30 (no skip), Mid: 3:10, Bottom: 3:00 ⬥ @Nex Adept - Without ecb: Average 1:55 across 2 b2b solo kills or With ecb: Average 1:40 across 2 b2b solo kills ⬥ @Temple of Aminishi Adept - Sub 14:00 solo full run ⬥ @Dragonkin Laboratory Adept - Sub 16:30 solo full run (+30s off-task) ⬥ @Shadow Reef Adept - Sub 17:00 solo full run ⬥ @Raksha Adept - Sub 2:40 (ranged) or Sub 2:50 (melee/mage) Average across 2 b2b kills, solo or duo (duo must be base role) ⬥ @RotS Adept - 20 kills in 30minutes (40kph pace) ⬥ @Solak Adept - Sub 7:00 Duo ⬥ @Telos Adept - Sub 4:45 at 999% and 800-999% streak (screenshot proof of a 16+ long streak, with ending enrage above 979% (1k+ also works)) ⬥ @Vorago Adept - Sub 10:20 average over 2 b2b Duo kills on any week (must show exp drops) Feats ⬥ @Solo BM - Solo Beastmaster Durzag ⬥ @4k Telos - Achieve 4k enrage at Telos Tier 3 All submissions require supporting video of kill to be reviewed by staff. If unable to provide your own, then someone else's recording will suffice depending on the circumstance. Master Master represents extensive understanding of the encounter, utilizing the fastest consistent methods with few mistakes. ⬥ @AoD Master - Average sub 2:00 across 3 b2b 7man kills (subject to vod review) ⬥ @Araxxor Master - Two b2b kills of average time on all paths: Top: 2:15 (Melee no skip) or 2:05 (Range), Mid: 3:05, Bottom: 2:50 ⬥ @Nex Master - Average 1:25 min/kill across 2 b2b solo kills (no dummy). b2b2b required if using Ascendri bolts. ⬥ @Temple of Aminishi Master - Sub 11:00 solo full run ⬥ @Dragonkin Laboratory Master - Sub 14:00 solo full run ⬥ @Shadow Reef Master - Sub 14:00 solo full run ⬥ @Raksha Master - Sub 2:20 average over 2 b2b kills, solo or duo (duo must be base role) ⬥ @RotS Master - 46 kill hour (Incite, subject to vod review) ⬥ @Solak Master - Sub 6:00 Duo ⬥ @Telos Master - Sub 4:10 average over 3 b2b kills at 1000%+ ⬥ @Vorago Master - Sub 9:10 average over 2 b2b Duo kills on any week (must show exp drops) Feats ⬥ @Solo Solak - Solo Solak (no HP cheese or pre-shatter) ⬥ @Solo Mirage - Solo Yakamaru (Mirage phase) ⬥ @Duo HM 6/6 - Duo Hardmode Vorago on all 6 weeks Tier 4 Videos must be provided for all tags, and submissions can be rejected on a subjective basis even if the stated criteria are met. All tags are subject to the discretion of moderators/administrators Grandmaster Grandmaster represents truly mastering the most difficult encounters available, utilizing the fastest consistent methods with high precision and few mistakes. ⬥ @Solak Grandmaster - Sub 5:40 Duo (-10s if storm tanking) ⬥ @Telos Grandmaster - Sub 3:50 (Magic) or Sub 4:00 (Melee) or Sub 3:15 (Range) average over 3 b2b kills at 2449%+ Feats ⬥ @200 Killstreak - Achieve a 200 killstreak at Telos Tier 5 These are not your typical goals to shoot for. These are designated to be insane pvm achievements and feats that only the best of the best could attain, if that . When they are achieved in-game we will reward you with a special tag here in PvME! @RNG Manipulator ⬥ Current holder of the most records on the PVM Record Sheet @Pride of Zaros ⬥ Solo AoD @True Animaster ⬥ 200ks at 4000% start Note: Power creep may place mastery tags on hold pending updates.

docs.text: Barrows Barrows as a High Level Player (Courtesy of #Linie & #zappy) Introduction Generally, Barrows is only camped by high level players in an effort to obtain the Graverobber title. The brothers are relatively weak, with the exception of Linza. Additionally, having obtained Morytania Legs 3+ is useful and increases loot obtained. Drops ⬥ ‎ ‎ Corruption sigil ⬥ ‎ ‎ Barrows equipment ⬥ Amulet of the Forsaken Presets ⬥ The Undead Slayer perk and sigil are very helpful to have on armour. ⬥ The ghost hunter equipment set can be worn in the head and cape slots for a 6% boost to all brothers except Linza. ⬥ The Salve Amulet however, does not work on the brothers. ⬥ Enhanced Replenishment potions may be used over adrenaline renewals . ⬥ Luck of the Dwarves can be brought as a switch before looting the chest. It increases the chance of receiving Elite clues and commons such as dragon med helm but does not affect Barrows items drop rates. ⬥ A Drakan's Medallion is used teleport to the Barrows to reduce the time spent between runs. ⬥ A Blessed Flask can be taken to save on inventory space and minimize rebanking. ⬥ During the first run, an Oldak coil should be placed beside Linza's tomb for a significant DPS increase. ⬥ A range switch may be taken for Akrisae although this is not necessary. Mage Preset ⬥ Rune Pouch (Runes for ) Melee Preset ⬥ Legs with Mobile and Undead Slayer + Other PvM perk. Use legs without mobile if excal has mobile on it. ⬥ Relics ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Persistent Rage ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Fury of the Small Strategy Order the Brothers Should be Killed Ahrim → Linza → Dharok → Guthan → Karil → Torag → Verac → Akrisae General Strategy ⬥ Use your amulet on Akrisae, and on the 2/3 bottom crypts. ⬥ If any brother is in the tunnels instead of their crypt you can use the amulet on the loot chest for the same function. This is ideal as killing a brother while doing tunnels interrupts movement. ⬥ If you encounter Akrisae in the tunnels, he can be one shot before he's able to prayer switch by doing the following: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Mage: + + ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Melee: Auto + → → ⬥ Use Powerburst of Acceleration in outer paths. Try to use these paths if feasible as opening doors reduce speed. ⬥ During your first run, place your Oldak Coil beside Linza's tomb. ⬥ Tunnel doors are 2 tiles wide, click to open the door directly in front of you to avoid wasting a tick walking to the other door. ⬥ Tc and use basics on monsters in tunnels to guarantee 100% adrenaline start on Linza on your next run, and get some additional loot. Mage Coming Soon Melee ⬥ Linza's Room : ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Ahrim ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎Auto + ‎ ‎ , proceed with Linza. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Linza (Adren pot) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ + + → → → + → bleed → → + 3 hit → finish with 188s ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Linza (No adren pot) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ + → → + → + bleed → 2 hit → ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎- Erethdor's Grimoire is recommended for Linza as + can boost and hits over hitcap, especially on Berserker or Mahjarrat auras. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Finish off Ahrim after Linza if required. ⬥ For the rest the of brothers: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Auto + 188s (to build adren) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Auto + → (188 or if not dead) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• tc + → Cancel with 188 for ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Auto + → (188 or if not dead) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Auto + → Cancel with 188 for (If Ahrim or Akrisae is in tunnel) General Tips As a low level boss, Barrows kph will scale to the level of effort put in. Optimally, using the melee preset, you will be able to get 22-25 kph depending on tunnel rng. Melee Video Example (Courtesy of #zappy) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OQQVIubMF9I

docs.text: ⬥ The Undead Slayer perk and sigil are very helpful to have on armour. ⬥ The ghost hunter equipment set can be worn in the head and cape slots for a 6% boost to all brothers except Linza. ⬥ The Salve Amulet however, does not work on the brothers. ⬥ Enhanced Replenishment potions may be used over adrenaline renewals . ⬥ Luck of the Dwarves can be brought as a switch before looting the chest. It increases the chance of receiving Elite clues and commons such as dragon med helm but does not affect Barrows items drop rates. ⬥ A Drakan's Medallion is used teleport to the Barrows to reduce the time spent between runs. ⬥ A Blessed Flask can be taken to save on inventory space and minimize rebanking. ⬥ During the first run, an Oldak coil should be placed beside Linza's tomb for a significant DPS increase. ⬥ A range switch may be taken for Akrisae although this is not necessary. Mage Preset ⬥ Rune Pouch (Runes for ) Melee Preset ⬥ Legs with Mobile and Undead Slayer + Other PvM perk. Use legs without mobile if excal has mobile on it. ⬥ Relics ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Persistent Rage ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Fury of the Small
docs.title: Presets

docs.text: Order the Brothers Should be Killed Ahrim → Linza → Dharok → Guthan → Karil → Torag → Verac → Akrisae General Strategy ⬥ Use your amulet on Akrisae, and on the 2/3 bottom crypts. ⬥ If any brother is in the tunnels instead of their crypt you can use the amulet on the loot chest for the same function. This is ideal as killing a brother while doing tunnels interrupts movement. ⬥ If you encounter Akrisae in the tunnels, he can be one shot before he's able to prayer switch by doing the following: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Mage: + + ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Melee: Auto + → → ⬥ Use Powerburst of Acceleration in outer paths. Try to use these paths if feasible as opening doors reduce speed. ⬥ During your first run, place your Oldak Coil beside Linza's tomb. ⬥ Tunnel doors are 2 tiles wide, click to open the door directly in front of you to avoid wasting a tick walking to the other door. ⬥ Tc and use basics on monsters in tunnels to guarantee 100% adrenaline start on Linza on your next run, and get some additional loot. Mage Coming Soon Melee ⬥ Linza's Room : ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Ahrim ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎Auto + ‎ ‎ , proceed with Linza. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Linza (Adren pot) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ + + → → → + → bleed → → + 3 hit → finish with 188s ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Linza (No adren pot) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ + → → + → + bleed → 2 hit → ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎- Erethdor's Grimoire is recommended for Linza as + can boost and hits over hitcap, especially on Berserker or Mahjarrat auras. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Finish off Ahrim after Linza if required. ⬥ For the rest the of brothers: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Auto + 188s (to build adren) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Auto + → (188 or if not dead) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• tc + → Cancel with 188 for ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Auto + → (188 or if not dead) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Auto + → Cancel with 188 for (If Ahrim or Akrisae is in tunnel) General Tips As a low level boss, Barrows kph will scale to the level of effort put in. Optimally, using the melee preset, you will be able to get 22-25 kph depending on tunnel rng. Melee Video Example (Courtesy of #zappy) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OQQVIubMF9I
docs.title: Strategy

docs.text: Chaos elemental Starting out at Chaos Elemental Introduction Chaos Elemental is another old boss, and also one with the distinction of being located in the wilderness. There is not much to this boss, as the only interesting mechanic present is his ability to unequip your gear. Do not take anything you are not willing to lose, and in general it is recommended to 1 item the boss with a royal crossbow or hellfire bow. More specific information is available here: https://runescape.wiki/w/Chaos_elemental Drops ⬥ ‎ ‎ Ancient warriors equipment 1/847 ⬥ ‎ ‎ Ribs of chaos 1/2500 (500 threshold)

docs.text: Dagannoth kings Dagannoth Kings (Courtesy of #Linie) Introduction Dagannoth Kings are generally only camped by high level players as a more interesting version of a Dagannoths slayer task (if for some reason you're not skipping Dagannoth tasks), or in an effort to get the pets or the collection log. More information is available here: https://runescape.wiki/w/Dagannoth_Kings Drops ⬥ ‎ ‎ Dagannoth Claw 1/2500 (1500 threshold) ⬥ ‎ ‎ Dagannoth Egg 1/2500 (1500 threshold) ⬥ ‎ ‎ Dagannoth Scale 1/2500 (1500 threshold) Preset For maximum efficiency, bring all 3 styles, hybrid gear in every slot possible: ⬥ Fremmenik Sea Boots 4 to note the bones, and for hybrid stats. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Inquisitor Staff is best-in-slot for Dagannoth Rex. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Terrasaur Maul with Masterwork Spear of Annihilation is best-in-slot for Dagannoth Supreme. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• The Spear should be used as a switch for applying bleeds. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Hexhunter Bow is best-in-slot for Dagannoth Prime. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• The quiver contains Araxyte arrows, T80 arrows (or better) should be used. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Weapon Poison+++ flask should be used as the Kings are poisonable. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Cinderbane Gloves to increase poison damage and for hybrid stats. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Ripper Demon is used for its passive effect and autos, if opting to use Death From Above special you may replace Super Restores with Spiritual Prayers . ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Its special attack should ideally only be used manually on Dagannoth Supreme to prevent wastage, as the Ripper Demon can not hit the other two Kings. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Ancient Elven Ritual Shard restores prayer over time on a 5-minute cooldown (100% optional) ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rune Pouch (Runes for and ) Note: The below strategy should work fine with good perks and Noxious Weapons if lacking the BiS weaponry, however a Spear of Annihilation is still highly recommended for the Dagannoth Supreme rotation Note 2: If you do not own a hybrid set of armour, you can bring Power Armour for each style and swap between them (this is higher effort, but also technically faster). For more detail on armour go to the Armour section of #armour-and-weapons Overview of the Fight (Courtesy of #Lord Tywin I) Optimal Strategy Breakdown Camp Soul Split and switch to the respective T95/T99 Curses ( / ) as you kill the Kings. Cancel the channelled threshold abilities with basic abilities to gain additional adren if the King is about to die. Ability Rotations ⬥ Dagannoth Supreme → walked → → (cancel with / ) ⬥ Dagannoth Prime → → → → (cancel with ) ⬥ Dagannoth Rex walked → → → → → (cancel with / ) Example Kill https://youtu.be/SdFGL1LHkjk Low Effort Guide (Courtesy of #Big Archive) Introduction It’s possible to “semi-AFK” the Dagganoth Kings by switching weapons and using revolution, even without any hybrid armor. Normally, using armor that’s off-style has an accuracy penalty i.e. if using a Melee weapon, then magic/range armor will lower accuracy. For DKs, a combination of T90 weapons + overloads + T80 power armor of different styles will ensure 100% accuracy on all three kings. Higher armor or lower tier weapons will affect accuracy, but adding prayers/curses will get accuracy back up to 100%. The strategy here is to wear power armor of different types i.e. (melee helm, range body, mage legs), and swap weapons/prayer for each king. This requires two clicks/key binds every kill, but is otherwise auto-pilot. Preset ⬥ Penance aura used to restore prayer but isn’t needed. ⬥ Use 2H weapons to simplify clicks/keybinds for swaps. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rune Pouch (Runes for ) Revolution Bars ⬥ If Using : ⬥ Generic 2H Melee : ⬥ Generic 2H Range : ⬥ Generic 2H Mage : ⬥ Prayer/Weapon Switches : Camp Soul Split and switch to the respective T95/T99 Curses ( / ) as you kill the Kings. This setup should get ~160kph with T85-87 weapons in a standard instance, and can get to ~200kph with T90 weapons + a custom instance for fast re-spawns.

docs.text: Giant mole Giant Mole Introduction Another old boss, only camped for pet and title. Giant mole is very straightforward, only requiring the ability to do damage. The only relevant mechanic present is her dig, where she will dig to a different part of the arena, indicated by a dirt arrow on the ground. Falador Hard and Elite diaries provide buffs to the rewards from mole, but these are minimal, and not required for camping the boss. can be used to mitigate any damage done by the Mole. More information available at the wiki page: https://runescape.wiki/w/Giant_mole Drops ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rotten fang 1/2500 Normal mode (500 threshold) 1/500 Hard mode (500 threshold) Preset Advanced Preset A Kal'gerion demon familiar with Crit-i-Kal scrolls is used due to the burst nature of the boss fight. Also Zamorak brews can be utilized to lower your own hp and increase the damage buff from the Berseker's Fury relic . ⬥ Erethdor's Grimoire ⬥ Dragon Battleaxe - special attack used at War's Retreat. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Combat Dummy Advanced Strategy (Courtesy of #Kukkelis) Strategy & Requirements This advanced strategy aims to make getting kills effortless by minimizing the amount of digs during the fight. This is done by stacking damage buffs and focusing on burst damage in the first room. On average you only need to go tag mole once. Following the rotation gives 55-60 kills per hour. The following boosts are important to make this strategy work: ⬥ Erethdor's Grimoire ⬥ Dragon Battleaxe special attack ⬥ Vulnerability Bombs ⬥ Mahjarrat Aura /Berserker Aura ⬥ Berserker's Fury relic with low hp ⬥ Kal'gerion demon familiar special attack Rotation Enter instance → → → → + → on dummy → (wait 1t) → → (wait 2t after gcd + ) → (tc) + → (wait 1t) → → Mole digs at this point → on dummy → build adren → (go tag Mole if she doesn't return to middle room) → on Mole → / → Example Kill https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uC8Ss1FF9wQ

docs.text: Gwd1 God Wars Dungeon 1 Introduction Generally, GWD1 is only AFKed as a high level player. Bring prayer potions/super restores and use Soulsplit, while using the best weapon you have with augmented T70/T80 Armor. Style is unimportant, except for the fact that the Armadyl GWD1 Boss cannot be killed with melee. Summon a legendary pet with beast of burden and forage, so that it picks up drops for you and acts as an inventory to store drops and supplies at the beginning of the trip. Use excalibur special attacks as needed, and AFK with the Revolution++ Bars provided at: https://runescape.wiki/w/Revolution/Bars#Revolution++_optimal_bars Drops ⬥ ‎ ‎ Godsword shards 1/256 ⬥ ‎ ‎ Pet drop 1/5000 Normal mode (1000 threshold) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ 1/1000 Hard mode (1000 threshold) Preset Slayer helmet boosts work on K'ril/Kree when on a Greater Demons/Aviansies task. If you choose to use a legendary pet instead of a titan, replace spiritual prayers with super restores. Activating the Intimidation totem will allow you to leave and reenter the boss room without needing to gain 40 kc, this can be used as a way to increase kph ⬥ ‎ ‎ Ancient Elven Ritual Shard - Restores prayer overtime, 5 minute cooldown ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rune Pouch (Runes for and )

docs.text: Kalphite queen Kalphite Queen Introduction As a very old boss, Kalphite Queen is relatively unrewarding and relatively simple. Typically only done for pet or collection log, there is no further reason for a high level account to do this boss. The only notable mechanic is her form change. She will spawn into the instance immune to range and magic, and therefore must be melee'd.After the first 40k damage is dealt, she will change forms to her flying form, which is immune to melee. Simply bring two styles, and DPS both forms of the queen down. More information available here: https://runescape.wiki/w/Kalphite_Queen Drops ⬥ ‎ ‎ KQ head 1/128 ⬥ ‎ ‎ Kalphite egg 1/2500 (500 threshold) Presets Slayer helmet boosts work when on a Kalphites task, and the preset for DKs can be recycled, simply removing a Range or Mage weapon as only 2 styles are needed. Basic Preset ⬥ Ancient elven ritual shard: Restores prayer overtime, 5 minute cooldown ⬥ Hybrid Armour: Ideally Anima core of Sliske or Akrisae's equipment for Invention perks. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rune Pouch (Runes for and ) Advanced Preset AFK Overview (Courtesy of #Akva) Explanation ⬥ This method is slower than the active hybrid methods (~37KPH), but it requires little to no input. Verac the Defiled’s set effect along with Weapon poison+++ and a Ripper demon with scrolls effectively kills Kalphite Queen’s second phase in a timely manner. ⬥ Elder overload salve , Penance aura , and Elven Ritual shard activation will sustain and use indefinitely. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• A holy wrench may negate the need to periodically activate the shard, allowing for increased AFK time. ⬥ No active pocket slot is necessary. ⬥ The use of potion reservoirs allows for 36 minute AFK times, resulting in only needing to make sure the player isn't lobbied. Strategy For this method it is important to have a few things: ⬥ Verac the Defiled’s equipment with standard perks. ⬥ Cinderbane gloves ⬥ Ripper demon familiar with scrolls ⬥ ‎ ‎ Penance Aura ⬥ ‎ ‎ Persistent Rage relic Stand here: Action Bar Video Guide (Courtesy of #Waswere) https://youtu.be/eBfiJfTe3v0

docs.text: King black dragon King Black Dragon Introduction As with many low tier bosses, KBD is only camped for title and pet. To this end, it is generally most effective to AFK the boss, and reserve any active gameplay time for more interesting bosses. To this end, an AFK preset is provided. It is encouraged to use either Legacy or the Revolution bar provided below: Drops ⬥ ‎ ‎ KBD Head 1/128 ⬥ ‎ ‎ KBD Scale 1/2500 (500 threshold) Preset The preset takes advantage of elder overload salves, which provide an antifire effect, to reduce most damage taken in a fight with KBD. An excalibur is used for any health upkeep that might be needed (this should not be a problem with soul split, however). A demonhorn necklace can optionally be used in conjunction with a bonecrusher, to allow for prayer upkeep based on the bones of KBD. The use of potion reservoirs allow for 36 minute AFK times, resulting in only needing to make sure the player isn't lobbied. It is highly recommended to use the dragon slayer perk. A slayer helmet can be used if on task, either worn or in slayer lodge. ‎ ‎The Dragon bane 2h sword is BiS at KBD though it cannot be resold and should be considered optional. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Adrenaline urn Prevents adren loss after dropping combat, stores up to 1000% adrenaline ⬥ ‎ ‎ Ancient elven ritual shard Restores prayer overtime, 5 minute cooldown Action Bar

docs.text: Corporeal beast Corporeal Beast (Courtesy of #Kahva) Introduction The Corporeal Beast is a boss unlocked from completing the Summer's End quest. If you followed the lore behind the quest, you will understand why summoning familiars cannot be used at the boss, meaning that you can only use the items in your inventory. A legendary pet can be used here. Furthermore, any weapon that isn't a spear will deal half damage, meaning that melee is the only style you should use. Drops The droprate for obtaining a sigil is 1/512 . If a player rolls the sigil drop table, there is a 1/5 chance of Arcane, 1/5 chance of Divine, 1/5 chance of Elysian, and 2/5 chance of Spectral. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Spirit shield 1/64 ⬥ ‎ ‎ Holy elixir 1/171 ⬥ ‎ ‎ Spectral sigil ⬥ ‎ ‎ Arcane sigil ⬥ ‎ ‎ Divine sigil ⬥ ‎ ‎ Elysian sigil ⬥ ‎ ‎ Corporeal bone 1/2500 (500 threshold) Presets General As stated before, any weapon that isn't a spear will deal half damage, so melee is the only style that should be used at this boss. If you don't have a T92 spear then Reaper necklace is greatly preferred over the amulet of souls, as you do not have 100% hit chance. The Masuta's Warspear does work at Corporeal Beast (tested on approximately 200+ kills) and may be used in a solo situation as you will not have to prayer flick for melee swipes, however this is less optimal. Advanced Melee Preset Weapon poison will stack with the cinderbanes effect. A vampyrism scrimshaw will help sustain longer trips, and a cannon can be used for extra damage output (kinetic cyclone is used over coil as it does more damage, albeit at the cost of range). Jellyfish and brews can be used for general healing without adrenaline loss. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rune Pouch (Runes for ) Mechanics Auto Attacks The Corporeal Beast will attack with only magic attacks if you are outside of melee distance. If you are within melee distance, the boss will use both melee and magic. Melee swipes are noticeable when the boss swipes with its front two legs. Also, protection prayers will not halve incoming damage, instead only partially reducing damage. ⬥ Magic attacks will do an AOE splash on their target in a 3x3 square. This means you should stand at least 2 squares away from your partner(s), if applicable. Core Occasionally, a dark core will spawn and jump towards its target. This dark core will do constant typeless damage and will heal the boss unless it is killed or you step away from it. It will do typeless hits unless you are more than 1 square away. Advanced Corp Killing Strat (~100 kph if done well) Misc Things to Have Legendary pet for picking items (do not add a familiar, just summon the legendary pet), cannon with autorefill, disruption shield, ZGS spec. None of these are mandatory, but will noticeably increase kills/hr. Not owning a ZGS probably lowers kph by around 10. Corp is an outdated boss with slow spawn times, thanks to it having an easily accessible public instance you can abuse and this is what the method is based on. Kills will be alternated between the public and private instances. Corp Tech Corp has the mechanic where he only takes full damage from spears, though there is a way get around which increases your kills if used enough. It is done in these steps: Run out of md Cast the dw ability you want to use and click the ground Equip your spear and click corp (you only use Decimate and gFlurry ). This gives you another 188 ability to use and pretty much cuts out smash and worse abilities from your rotation. Rotations ⬥ Non-instanced Corp : → → (stall for 1st hit)> → → → → → → → → → → improvise as it is near death. ⬥ Instanced Corp : Auto + → → asap + / ‎ ‎based on cd (don't use sever on corp unless you are under 60% adren) → → → → → → → → → improvise. Optional Rotations for No ZGS ⬥ These arent necessarily optimal but instead of throwing a ZGS spec (because you don't own one), you will abuse Slaughter and Blood tendrils as they are very strong. ⬥ Looks roughly like: → → → → → → → → → → → → → improvise. Video Example https://youtu.be/AaRA-nh6eM4 (2 kill example) https://youtu.be/Zfxg3dxf_pA (84 kph pace) Tips/Notes ⬥ Since the kills are so fast, you can leave the non-instanced loot on the ground every other kill. When Corp dies, call your legendary pet and renew cannon (if needed) and exit. You can leave the loot on the ground in the world instance and every other kill you can go loot the old loot along with the new and leave. ⬥ For instanced kills, you let your pet pick up the loot. After it has visually taken the loot, you wait 2-4 ticks and click exit (1 tick before it's in your inventory, you can leave and still get it). ⬥ During an hour you should bank twice. This method is recommended to everyone intending to do Corp even if you aren't the most experienced player, since this just kills most of the waiting time essentially increasing your efficiency. ⬥ The dark core doesn't use up your disruption shield , so you can camp with it even if the core is on you. AFK Method (~55 kph) (Credit to #Omid) Explanation This method will net a lower amount of kills per hour but may be used if you do not wish to put in high amounts of effort into a mid level boss. It is useful for title/pet hunting however there are a few prerequisites in order to sustain yourself. This method utilizes and . Potion reservoirs may allow increased AFK time up to 36 minutes, resulting in only needing to make sure the player isn't lobbied; however, picking up some drops is advised. Preset For this method it is important to have some things: ⬥ ‎ ‎ Masterwork Spear ⬥ / ‎ ‎ Amulet of Souls ⬥ ‎ ‎ Penance Aura ⬥ ‎ ‎ Persistent Rage relic Action Bar Cannon Placement

docs.text: Corporeal Beast (Courtesy of #Kahva)
docs.title: Corporeal beast

docs.text: The Corporeal Beast is a boss unlocked from completing the Summer's End quest. If you followed the lore behind the quest, you will understand why summoning familiars cannot be used at the boss, meaning that you can only use the items in your inventory. A legendary pet can be used here. Furthermore, any weapon that isn't a spear will deal half damage, meaning that melee is the only style you should use.
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: The droprate for obtaining a sigil is 1/512 . If a player rolls the sigil drop table, there is a 1/5 chance of Arcane, 1/5 chance of Divine, 1/5 chance of Elysian, and 2/5 chance of Spectral. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Spirit shield 1/64 ⬥ ‎ ‎ Holy elixir 1/171 ⬥ ‎ ‎ Spectral sigil ⬥ ‎ ‎ Arcane sigil ⬥ ‎ ‎ Divine sigil ⬥ ‎ ‎ Elysian sigil ⬥ ‎ ‎ Corporeal bone 1/2500 (500 threshold)
docs.title: Drops

docs.text: General As stated before, any weapon that isn't a spear will deal half damage, so melee is the only style that should be used at this boss. If you don't have a T92 spear then Reaper necklace is greatly preferred over the amulet of souls, as you do not have 100% hit chance. The Masuta's Warspear does work at Corporeal Beast (tested on approximately 200+ kills) and may be used in a solo situation as you will not have to prayer flick for melee swipes, however this is less optimal. Advanced Melee Preset Weapon poison will stack with the cinderbanes effect. A vampyrism scrimshaw will help sustain longer trips, and a cannon can be used for extra damage output (kinetic cyclone is used over coil as it does more damage, albeit at the cost of range). Jellyfish and brews can be used for general healing without adrenaline loss. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rune Pouch (Runes for )

This dark core will do constant typeless damage and will heal the boss unless it is killed or you step away from it. It will do typeless hits unless you are more than 1 square away.

docs.text: Fight kiln The Fight Kiln (Courtesy of #Caldakoda and #Archeus) Introduction Fight kiln is a fairly easy fight once you know what you are doing and seems harder than it is. Completing the fight rewards you with BIS cape for all three styles. All of the gear and inventories can get switched around based on what you have and how experienced you are. For less experienced people keep the obsidian armour and bring more brews and solids with the best tier of weapon you have. Keep in mind to follow the combat triangle and to use common sense during the waves. General Breakdown ⬥ 1-9 are mostly weak to ⬥ 11-19 are mostly weak to ⬥ 21-29 are mostly weak to ⬥ 31 is weak to ⬥ 32 is weak to ⬥ 33 is weak to Presets Basic Preset (with obsidian) ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rune Pouch (Runes for and ) Advanced Preset ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rune Pouch (Runes for and ) Explanation ⬥ Steel titan + Spiritual Prayers are very good on the mobs, particularly the Dills, who are still weak to familiars before their armour is broken. Note: Titan is preferred over Ripper demon due to the fact that most monstrs will die before the ripper can get to them. ⬥ Obsidian armour reduces damage taken in the fight kiln and saves inventory space if not willing to bring armour switches. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Otherwise, tri-bridding is the best way to deal with the fight kiln. At the minimum, you want a 2h weapon of every style. ⬥ An appropriate amount of prayer is recommended as you will be in the fight kiln for ~20 minutes per kill. ⬥ God book or Grimoire is recommended for pocket slot. ⬥ The TokKul-Zo ring provides a 10% damage boost against the mobs but requires tokkul to upkeep. The First 10 Waves 1-9 There will be mostly rangers with an increasing number of magers and meleers so use melee and switch to kill the others. ⬥ Wave 2 : Invulnerability Crystal spawn ⬥ Wave 3 : Restoration Crystal spawn ⬥ Wave 5 : Dill spawn ⬥ Wave 9 : All rangers ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Use zerk on the last ‎ ‎ranger to get zerk for jad Wave 10 ⬥ Jad spawns South West ⬥ 1 ranger also spawns SE The Second 10 Wave 11-19 There will mostly be magers with an increasing number of meleers and rangers so use range and switch to kill the others. ⬥ Wave 14 : Invulnerability Crystal spawn ⬥ Wave 16 : Restoration Crystal spawn ⬥ Wave 19 : Dill spawn [switch to melee for Dill] ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Go NE and kill dill quickly then go SW and ds kill all the magers and use last of ds to attack jad Wave 20 ⬥ Jad - Spawns South West ⬥ Also spawns 1 mager SE The Third 10 Waves 21-29 There will mostly be meleers with an increasing number of mager and rangers so use mage and switch to kill the others. ⬥ Wave 26 : Invulnerability Crystal spawn ⬥ Wave 28 : Restoration Crystal spawn ⬥ Wave 28 : 6 Dills spawn w/ a mager [kill mage then swap to melee] ⬥ Wave 29 : Sun and DPS meleers and use end of sun on jad Wave 30 ⬥ Jad - Spawns South West ⬥ 3 rapid melee attackers spawn in other corners The Final Gauntlet The Jad-less Few ⬥ Wave 31 : Use Melee ⬥ Wave 32 : Use Magic ⬥ Wave 33 : Use Range Wave 34 ⬥ Jad - Spawns South East ⬥ Rapid melee attacker spawns NW; ranger SW Wave 35 ⬥ Jad - Spawns North East ⬥ Rapid melee attacker spawns NW; ranger SW; mager SE Wave 36 ⬥ Double Jad - Spawn in both Southern corners ⬥ Use invulnerability crystals here If playing on an Australian world: ǝɹǝɥ slɐʇsʎɹɔ ʎʇᴉlᴉqɐɹǝulnʌuᴉ ǝs∩ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• sɹǝuɹoɔ uɹǝɥʇnoS ɥʇoq uᴉ uʍɐdS - p∀ſ Ǝ˥q∩Op :9Ɛ ƎΛ∀M Wave 36+1 Har-Aken ⬥ Spawns tentacles that deal range/mage hits. Build/Heal on these when he is not on the surface ⬥ He never spawns on northern side of platform ⬥ Spam Summoning Potions /Spiritual Prayers ⬥ Can be Vulned ⬥Use Sunshine/Death's Swiftness/Berserk / / as he surfaces ⬥ Spawns after ~72 seconds and is up for ~30 seconds Tips/Tricks/Extra Thoughts General ⬥ You can use crystals of regeneration in emergencies and to extend onslaught on har-aken if you wanted to (make sure you have sign up just in case because the hits start to add up very quickly). ⬥ Use soul split for the whole fight and use deflects as you see needed as well as devotion (on wave 19 there are a lot of magers so using devotion can help). ⬥ Even though you should be soul splitting the fight, always use Protection Prayers on Jads. ⬥ Invulnerability crystal does not protect you from Dill special attack so you should use Restoration Crystal if getting low and brew is not enough. Speed ⬥ Make sure to take advantage of the combat triangle whenever possible. ⬥ Feel free to use Tokkul-Zo if you have excess tokkul from cauldron as that would be the best in slot ring of you are able to sustain it otherwise use Ring of Death or Asylum Surgeon's Ring . ⬥ It is helpful to use Lantadyme , Kwuarm , and Spirit Weed incense sticks for increased potion duration, weapon poison damage, and scrolls used per hour.

docs.title: Tips/Tricks/Extra Thoughts

docs.text: Gregorovic Gregorovic Introduction Sliske's general in the Heart of Glienor, Gregorovic is largely considered to be the hardest of the GWD2 bosses. This is generally due to his high accuracy and hard hits. Drops ⬥ ‎ ‎ Sliskean Essence ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• 1/128 base, 1/64 at 100% reputation ⬥ ‎ ‎ Crest of Sliske ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• 1/512 base, 1/256 at 100% reputation ⬥ ‎ ‎ Shadow glaives ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• 1/512 base, 1/256 at 100% reputation ⬥ ‎ ‎ Faceless mask ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• 1/2000 base (Normal Mode) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• 1/1000 base (Hard Mode) Each Gregorovic kill is worth 341,197, with 105,394 of that being from commons. Advanced players can get up to 70 kph, earning on average 23,883,787 gp/hr. If using the AFK method described in this guide, you can expect 44 kph, earning on average 15,012,666 gp/hr. Presets General Tips ⬥ The recommended method of killing Gregorovic involves using a halberd range weapon, such as a scythe, and toggling run off. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Stand at least 2 squares away (max halberd range) ⬥ Stand in the Northwest Corner of the arena, and pot up, waiting for Gregorovic to spawn and walk over to you and DPS him down, handling mechanics as they come up. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Summon spirits can be ignored as with this positioning, he will absorb the poisoning spirit, which has no effect due to the immunity provided by incense sticks. ⬥ A Scrimshaw of Vampyrism is used for extra sustain coupled with an is used to increase the effectiveness of Protection prayers, making the fight easier. Advanced Melee Preset Note: Everything displayed can be upgraded or downgraded as available. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Enhanced Luck Potion Gives tier 3 luck, can be removed if swapping to lotd ⬥ ‎ ‎ Ancient Elven Ritual Shard Restores prayer overtime, 5 minute cooldown ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rune Pouch ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rune Pouch (Runes for and ) Note: it is highly recommended to use Irit Incense Sticks at maximum potency, as it will nullify his poison mechanics entirely. Mechanics Attack Rotation 3 Autos → Bouncing Blade → 3 Autos → Summon Spirits → 3 Autos → Shadow Spots → Repeat Bouncing Blade The first special attack occurs after 3 autos and he will throw a blade that bounces between you, other players if available, and then himself (it will not damage him), it will hit players 3 times, whether thats one player 3 times or 3 players 1 time each. Summon Spirits He will summon a spirit dependent on the area of the room that he's standing in, that will walk towards him. If it reaches melee distance of him it will be consumed granting Greg a buff based on the spirit summoned. ‎ ‎The ghosts that are summoned are the spirts of Mania, Rage, and Delirium. ⬥ Spirit of Mania - connecting causes his attack speed to increase. ⬥ Spirit of Rage - connecting with him causes his damage to increase. ⬥ Spirit of Delirium - connecting causes his poison damage to increase. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• If using Venomblood as advised you can entirely ignore this spirit. By standing in the northwest corner he will only spawn this spirit. Shadow Spots Finally he will do a shadow spot attack similar to the twin furies, certain areas are marked with shadows that you must move out of to avoid a large mage hit, they come in small clusters with one being directly on the spot you are standing on and a few nearby. Clones At 140k health he will summon 2 clones, and at 60k he will summon 3 clones, they have 3k health each and Greg may teleport to them at random. AFK Melee Strategy (~41-44 kph) (Courtesy of #FriggityFrank and ‎ ‎#Mia Groves) Gp/hr Total 13,647,878 Note: Assumes Max Reputation and 40 kph. Explanation ⬥ This method will net a lower amount of kills per hour but may be used if you do not wish to put in high amounts of effort into a mid level boss. ⬥ It is very effective for title/pet hunting however there are a few prerequisites in order to sustain yourself. ⬥ It is important to pray and use a Superior/Scrimshaw of Vampyrism as this method relies on constant healing. ⬥ Aura choice can vary, but will affect how afk kills can be. They are listed in order of effectiveness: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Vampyrism Aura provides extra safety through its healing and allows more chances for poison damage. However, you have to pay more attention to prayer points between kills. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Penance Aura allows for the most afk experience, but can be a slightly unsafe without a Superior Scrimshaw of Vampyrism. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Dark Magic provides extra damage, but you lose both the afk-ness of Penance and the safety net that Vampyrism provides. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Do not use Berserker for afking, as it will get you killed very easily. ⬥ Either a Masterwork Spear of Annihilation or a Laniakea's Spear will be most effective for this method. Average kill times vary very little between them. Mandatory requirements ⬥ This setup should reliably allow you to afk Gregorovic, with the duration between checking your status dependent on the aura you are using. However, the following needs to be done or else This method will be either unreliable or will outright not work. Cutting corners will result in failure: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Soulsplit is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Turmoil or Malevolence is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Superior/Vampyrism Scrimshaw is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Elder Overload is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Poison is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Poison protection / is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Cinderbane Gloves are equipped ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Blood Reaver is summoned ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Run is on ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Auto-retaliate is on Preset ⬥ Persistent Rage Relic - Prevents adrenaline from draining while out of combat. Can be substituted with an Adrenaline Urn with ocassional stalling. Not required if using 0% start bar. ⬥ Irit Incense Sticks - Provide antipoison against Gregorovic. Not needed if using Venomblood perk on your armor. ⬥ Kwuarm Incense Sticks - Provide extra poison damage. ⬥ Essence of Finality - Saradomin Godsword stored. Emergency special attack if you're really low on health when you look back to your screen. Accuracy bonus helps when using Laniakea's Spear Action Bar - Masterwork Spear of Annihilation (Updated by #Mia Groves) ⬥ This action bar is what you should use if you are using a Masterwork Spear of Annihilation . It puts more focus on bleeds to capitalize on the spear's passive ability. Debilitate is also used because it is less reliable to get heals out of AoE abilities like Quake and Hurricane. Generally, this bar will be lower KPH but higher survivability regardless of aura choice. Action Bar - Laniakea's Spear ⬥ This action bar should be used with Laniakea's Spear . It has a more offensive focus and utilizes frequent AoE usage to heal off of minions rather than using Debilitate. Quake also sees higher usage to help mitigate the spear's accuracy issues. Due to the nature of this action bar, Trimmed Masterwork Armor is recommended to help mitigate burst damage from Greg. It is not necessary, but it helps with survivability. 0% Adrenaline Bar - Laniakea's Spear ⬥ This action bar can be used instead of the one listed above when not using Adrenaline Retention effects. This allows the user to maintain similar afk kill speeds, but foregoes some safety. Please bear in mind that Debilitate is not used, so be wary if not using a Superior Vampyrism Scrimshaw or the Vampyrism Aura . It is highly recommended to turn on the Auto-Regenerate combat setting while using this bar. AFK Ranged Strategy (~44-47 kph) (Courtesy of #FriggityFrank) Gp/hr Total 15,012,666 Note: Assumes Max Reputation and 44 kph. Explanation ⬥ This method will net a higher amount of kills per compared to the melee AFK setup, but has a much higher startup cost . However, the upkeep cost is significantly cheaper when compared to the melee setup. ⬥ While faster, sometimes you will need to move to collect your loot. As you won't be constantly close to Gregorovic, loot will often drop outside of your area-loot range. Playing on mobile mitigates the need to move due to a larger area loot radius. ⬥ It is important to pray as this method relies on constant healing. ⬥ Aura choice can vary, but will affect how afk kills can be. They are listed in order of effectiveness: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Penance Aura allows for the most afk experience and is very safe to use. HP may fluctuate an uncomfortable amount, but you generally heal enough to be more than safe enough, and helps maximise the usefulness of your Blood Reaver. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Dark Magic provides extra damage, but similarly to Vampyrism you must pay more attention to prayer points. This should be the most effective aura for fast kills, but is the least afk choice. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Mahjarrat Aura provides extra damage, but does not give any extra poison procs. Still, it is a viable option as a secondary aura. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Vampyrism Aura provides extra safety through its healing and allows more chances for poison damage. However, you may cap out your HP often and not be able to actually heal. This reduces the effectiveness of your Blood Reaver. You also need to pay more attention to your prayer between kills. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Do not use Reckless for afking, as it will get you killed very easily. ⬥ A Wyvern Crossbow will be one of the most effective weapons for this setup due to its passive. If you do not have one, other 2-handed range weapons should be fine to use, but may be slightly slower. Mandatory requirements ⬥ This setup should reliably allow you to afk Gregorovic, with the duration between checking your status dependent on the aura you are using. However, the following needs to be done or else This method will be either unreliable or will outright not work. Cutting corners will result in failure: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• You are standing 1 step out of melee distance of Greg's spawn point ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Adrenaline retention is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Greater Ricochet and Salt the Wound are unlocked ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Caroming 4 is on your weapon ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Soulsplit is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Anguish or Desolation is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Elder Overload is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Poison is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Poison protection / is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Cinderbane Gloves are equipped ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Blood Reaver is summoned ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Auto-retaliate is on ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• You are outside of melee distance Preset ⬥ Persistent Rage Relic - Prevents adrenaline from draining while out of combat. Can be substituted with an Adrenaline Urn with ocassional stalling. ⬥ Irit Incense Sticks - Provide antipoison against Gregorovic. Not needed if using Venomblood perk on your armor. ⬥ Kwuarm Incense Sticks - Provide extra poison damage. ⬥ Essence of Finality - Stored special attack is not used, but is worn for the accuracy bonus and Soulsplit passive. ⬥ Reaver's Ring - Extra critical chance helps speed up kills. If not owned, can be substituted for other strong rings such as Asylum Surgeon's or Ring of Death. ⬥ Book of Balance - Decent passive pocket item, provides extra poison procs and damage when activated. Reflecting Blood Essence can be used as a budget alternative. Action Bar 0% Adrenaline Action Bar ⬥ This action bar can be used instead of the one listed above when not using Adrenaline Retention effects. This allows the user to afk with Ranged and benefit from lower supply costs. However, the average kill speed is significantly slower (39-40kph) and the Vampyrism Aura is required for this bar to be reliably safe. It is highly recommended to turn on the Auto-Regenerate combat setting while using this bar.

docs.text: Sliske's general in the Heart of Glienor, Gregorovic is largely considered to be the hardest of the GWD2 bosses. This is generally due to his high accuracy and hard hits.

docs.text: ⬥ ‎ ‎ Sliskean Essence ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• 1/128 base, 1/64 at 100% reputation ⬥ ‎ ‎ Crest of Sliske ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• 1/512 base, 1/256 at 100% reputation ⬥ ‎ ‎ Shadow glaives ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• 1/512 base, 1/256 at 100% reputation ⬥ ‎ ‎ Faceless mask ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• 1/2000 base (Normal Mode) ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• 1/1000 base (Hard Mode) Each Gregorovic kill is worth 341,197, with 105,394 of that being from commons. Advanced players can get up to 70 kph, earning on average 23,883,787 gp/hr. If using the AFK method described in this guide, you can expect 44 kph, earning on average 15,012,666 gp/hr.
docs.title: Drops

docs.text: General Tips ⬥ The recommended method of killing Gregorovic involves using a halberd range weapon, such as a scythe, and toggling run off. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Stand at least 2 squares away (max halberd range) ⬥ Stand in the Northwest Corner of the arena, and pot up, waiting for Gregorovic to spawn and walk over to you and DPS him down, handling mechanics as they come up. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Summon spirits can be ignored as with this positioning, he will absorb the poisoning spirit, which has no effect due to the immunity provided by incense sticks. ⬥ A Scrimshaw of Vampyrism is used for extra sustain coupled with an is used to increase the effectiveness of Protection prayers, making the fight easier. Advanced Melee Preset Note: Everything displayed can be upgraded or downgraded as available. ⬥ ‎ ‎ Enhanced Luck Potion Gives tier 3 luck, can be removed if swapping to lotd ⬥ ‎ ‎ Ancient Elven Ritual Shard Restores prayer overtime, 5 minute cooldown ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rune Pouch ⬥ ‎ ‎ Rune Pouch (Runes for and ) Note: it is highly recommended to use Irit Incense Sticks at maximum potency, as it will nullify his poison mechanics entirely.
docs.title: Presets

docs.text: Attack Rotation 3 Autos → Bouncing Blade → 3 Autos → Summon Spirits → 3 Autos → Shadow Spots → Repeat Bouncing Blade The first special attack occurs after 3 autos and he will throw a blade that bounces between you, other players if available, and then himself (it will not damage him), it will hit players 3 times, whether thats one player 3 times or 3 players 1 time each. Summon Spirits He will summon a spirit dependent on the area of the room that he's standing in, that will walk towards him. If it reaches melee distance of him it will be consumed granting Greg a buff based on the spirit summoned. ‎ ‎The ghosts that are summoned are the spirts of Mania, Rage, and Delirium. ⬥ Spirit of Mania - connecting causes his attack speed to increase. ⬥ Spirit of Rage - connecting with him causes his damage to increase. ⬥ Spirit of Delirium - connecting causes his poison damage to increase. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• If using Venomblood as advised you can entirely ignore this spirit. By standing in the northwest corner he will only spawn this spirit. Shadow Spots Finally he will do a shadow spot attack similar to the twin furies, certain areas are marked with shadows that you must move out of to avoid a large mage hit, they come in small clusters with one being directly on the spot you are standing on and a few nearby. Clones At 140k health he will summon 2 clones, and at 60k he will summon 3 clones, they have 3k health each and Greg may teleport to them at random.
docs.title: Mechanics

docs.text: Gp/hr Total 13,647,878 Note: Assumes Max Reputation and 40 kph. Explanation ⬥ This method will net a lower amount of kills per hour but may be used if you do not wish to put in high amounts of effort into a mid level boss. ⬥ It is very effective for title/pet hunting however there are a few prerequisites in order to sustain yourself. ⬥ It is important to pray and use a Superior/Scrimshaw of Vampyrism as this method relies on constant healing. ⬥ Aura choice can vary, but will affect how afk kills can be. They are listed in order of effectiveness: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Vampyrism Aura provides extra safety through its healing and allows more chances for poison damage. However, you have to pay more attention to prayer points between kills. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Penance Aura allows for the most afk experience, but can be a slightly unsafe without a Superior Scrimshaw of Vampyrism. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Dark Magic provides extra damage, but you lose both the afk-ness of Penance and the safety net that Vampyrism provides. ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Do not use Berserker for afking, as it will get you killed very easily. ⬥ Either a Masterwork Spear of Annihilation or a Laniakea's Spear will be most effective for this method. Average kill times vary very little between them. Mandatory requirements ⬥ This setup should reliably allow you to afk Gregorovic, with the duration between checking your status dependent on the aura you are using. However, the following needs to be done or else This method will be either unreliable or will outright not work. Cutting corners will result in failure: ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Soulsplit is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Turmoil or Malevolence is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Superior/Vampyrism Scrimshaw is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Elder Overload is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Poison is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Poison protection / is active ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Cinderbane Gloves are equipped ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Blood Reaver is summoned ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Run is on ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎• Auto-retaliate is on Preset ⬥ Persistent Rage Relic - Prevents adrenaline from draining while out of combat. Can be substituted with an Adrenaline Urn with ocassional stalling. Not required if using 0% start bar. ⬥ Irit Incense Sticks - Provide antipoison against Gregorovic. Not needed if using Venomblood perk on your armor. ⬥ Kwuarm Incense Sticks - Provide extra poison damage. ⬥ Essence of Finality - Saradomin Godsword stored. Emergency special attack if you're really low on health when you look back to your screen. Accuracy bonus helps when using Laniakea's Spear Action Bar - Masterwork Spear of Annihilation (Updated by #Mia Groves) ⬥ This action bar is what you should use if you are using a Masterwork Spear of Annihilation . It puts more focus on bleeds to capitalize on the spear's passive ability. Debilitate is also used because it is less reliable to get heals out of AoE abilities like Quake and Hurricane. Generally, this bar will be lower KPH but higher survivability regardless of aura choice. Action Bar - Laniakea's Spear ⬥ This action bar should be used with Laniakea's Spear . It has a more offensive focus and utilizes frequent AoE usage to heal off of minions rather than using Debilitate. Quake also sees higher usage to help mitigate the spear's accuracy issues. Due to the nature of this action bar, Trimmed Masterwork Armor is recommended to help mitigate burst damage from Greg. It is not necessary, but it helps with survivability. 0% Adrenaline Bar - Laniakea's Spear ⬥ This action bar can be used instead of the one listed above when not using Adrenaline Retention effects. This allows the user to maintain similar afk kill speeds, but foregoes some safety. Please bear in mind that Debilitate is not used, so be wary if not using a Superior Vampyrism Scrimshaw or the Vampyrism Aura . It is highly recommended to turn on the Auto-Regenerate combat setting while using this bar.
